title: Plant Growth
content:
Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Plant Growth Information

Description: Make weeds burst from the ground and smother the area. Creatures moving through the weeds have their movement speed quartered. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Transmutation School Duration: 10 turns Casting Time: Action Range: 6m 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Plant Growth

Plant G
